transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji namaskar.
Customer: Ji namaskar sir.
Executive: Mere pass ek India Mart se inquiry aati hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ki hume 53000 liter azoto vector chahiyega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Humne kaha humse hum unhone rate manga humne rate de diya unhone kaha theek hai sir aapka registration gem pe hai maine kaha hamara gem pe hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To aap aap pehle gem pe registration kara lo fir hum aapko order de dete hain aap hamare liye maal bana dena 50% advance dal lenge 50% maal jis din dispatch hoga us din de denge kareeb 21 crore rupaye ka order hai.
Executive: Theek hai kya naam hai apni company ka sir?
Customer: Ashutosh agro chemical and bio fertilizer private limited.
Executive: Theek hai abhi mohan sir baat kare na.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Hmm theek hai to ye gem portal pe registration mang rahe hai wo right?
Customer: Gem portal pe registration manga uske liye usne documents ki KYC thi wo kara di ab 15000 rupaye usne kaha ji iski 10000 rupaye iski fees hai gem portal pe jo first time lagti hai baki ajeevan kuch nahi lagta hai.
Executive: To ye aapko unhone manga hai jinhone registration ke liye bola hai.
Customer: Haan India Mart se jo inquiry thi India Mart ke number se inquiry thi wo number mere phone mein India Mart ke inquiry ke naam se save hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Achcha achcha ek bar use lead manager mein ja ke check karo kya wo number waha pe dikh raha hai sir ek bar lead manager open karna.
Customer: Haan dikh raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Lead manager mein dekh raha hu to waha pe bhi wo number dikh raha hai.
Executive: Achcha waha bhi dikh raha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai ab isme ek bar sir hum log 15000 rupaye dal diye maine inke pass.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ab mobile number band hai ab hi hello kuch nahi na wo India Mart wala reply de raha na jo dusre number pe paise dalwaye the na wo reply de raha.
Executive: Hmm ek bar sir video meeting pe aayenge sir to ek bar mujhe wo dikha do detail wagera uska main video recording kar leta hu kaun sa wala inquiry aaya tha kahan se theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan main aapko google meeting ka link send kar raha hu aapke registered mail pe main ankit baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se aapka account manager theek hai mere pass hi call lagaya aapka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm ek bar sir dekho sir aapko aaya hoga mail aaya hoga.
Customer: Mail to abhi nahi aaya naya to pehla hi mail aaya bada.
Executive: Ek second ha refresh kar lo ab aa gaya hoga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai abhi screen please hold while you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received inquiry via IndiaMART.

- Customer paid ₹15,000 for GEM registration.

- Contact numbers are now switched off.

- No reply from IndiaMART or other contact.


Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting.

- Executive sent a Google Meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, gem registration, video meeting
